lender.name: YO NO FUI
lender.occupational_info:
Yo No Fui is an interdisciplinary group working on art and production projects of women in prisons of Buenos Aires, in Argentina, and more recently out of prison, once they have regained their freedom.
This non-govermental organization, a social and civil association , promotes active and specifically the inclusion of marginalized people providing them a place to learn and produce through workshops of capacitacion, personal expression and production. In the present there are workshops of serigraphy, encuadernation and book binding, dressmaking, poetry, integrating dance, among other projects.

lender.name: Kent
lender.loan_because:
Once, I met a young woman in an airport waiting lounge who had a distinctive tattoo of a mathematical formula on her left arm. Although I had my camera with me, I was too shy to ask her to let me photograph her tattoo. I wasn't too shy to ask her what it meant, though. She told me she was a graduate student of economics; the formula represented an equation for distribution of wealth. (Unless I'm mistaken, the tattoo was the Gini Coefficient, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gini_coefficient.)
How appealing it was for her to use her intellect in ways that will improve the world as well as herself. And how compelling that she literally wore what she carried in her heart on her sleeve.
What better way to export democracy than through its handmaiden, capitalism? I hope that our collective generosity pays economic, social, and political dividends around the world, where we most need it.
It pleases me to share the blessings I have received with others.
lender.occupational_info: I think, write, and edit other people's writing for a living. I am also a graduate student (still more thinking and writing).

lender.occupational_info: im just graduated from college

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I'm interested in people all over the world succeeding in life. And because it's a God given responsibility.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in my second year of medical school; I am training to become a physician.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I like to help others and I'm a firm believer in "The Golden Rule" which states that 'one should treat others as one would like others to treat oneself'.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student who is interested in economics and the stock market.

lender.name: LAURENT
lender.occupational_info: I lend so that to change lives of marginalized people to have better lives

lender.name: thea
lender.loan_because: I think micro finance is a good thing to help people directly .

lender.name: Nhi
lender.loan_because: I just want to help!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it can help people
lender.occupational_info: I run a polling business, where we research what people think about issues and companies.

lender.name: Helene
lender.loan_because: sometimes I think my life is not so great but then I think that others have a really diffiuclt life, so ........

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: Purchases wholesale food and sale stuffs them retail.
lender.occupational_info: My activity takes place on Ukraine, in large town with a population more than 3 milionov man. Business consists of retailing of produktovv feed, at the market. For expansion of assortment I need a credit now.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: To share what I was given and because I think, that sharing responsibility is the best way to help (better than donating money...)
lender.occupational_info: I always wanted to be a teacher, so after finishing my law studies I started to lecture at the university and conduct my PhD...and I am enjoying it :-)

lender.name: Donatella
lender.loan_because: We are all one. Some years ago I also needed fund-raising for my job.
lender.occupational_info: I say and write in my country's language the words from other languages, so that people can understand better each other.

lender.name: madhukar
lender.loan_because: I like empowering people and I want to be a role model for my childrent.
lender.occupational_info: Healthcare marketing and sales

lender.name: Kjell
lender.loan_because: I can :-)

lender.name: Geraint
lender.loan_because: It provides me with fun while helping others to help themselves. We owe each other the right to a noble life

lender.name: Alexandria & Vincent
lender.loan_because: We loan because it allows us to feel the joy of being connected to everyone in the world. Thank you Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: Alex is an interior designer, Vincent is an artist.

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune and hope for economic & social justice.

lender.name: Marcus
lender.loan_because: I believe everybody deserves a chance to start their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a software company

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I want to share all that I have.
lender.occupational_info: I work with businesses to reduce their environmental impact generally in the way of reducing their energy consumption.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is an important tool for addressing global poverty and Kiva is a great way to participate as an individual
lender.occupational_info: I am a textile designer who is trained in weaving. I also study sustainable business.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I wish to create equality in the world -- and the least I can do is to give my one day's earnings to people across the ocean who can take that, and build a life.
lender.occupational_info: I ensure the safe separation of aircraft traveling within the global airspace system

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to build international relations at the personal level and help people in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: Austin, Texas

lender.name: Niklas
lender.loan_because: It's a small thing to do, but it still has a positive effect on others.
lender.occupational_info: I develop and manage computer systems.

lender.name: ronald
lender.occupation: Proprietor - Cheap School Supplies for the Youth

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and I like the added touch of seeing some of them they are.

lender.name: Chad & Lynde
lender.loan_because: I want to do something that matters.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: helping matters.

lender.name: Jeff Liebmann
lender.loan_because: Justice must include sharing economic wealth across the world, giving people the chance to achieve their goals and find happiness.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I feel we should all try to give to people that need it. We are only here for a short time we should always look for the good in people.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: I have a desire to implement great changes someday. This is a first step for me.
lender.occupational_info: I create computer programs that handle information and make tasks easier. I can create anything, even if others say it is impossible.

lender.name: The Mathews CT USA
lender.loan_because: we are so fortunate to be able to share with others and we hope to make a difference.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who want to make their part of the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for running multiple online stores for a business that sells outdoor sports and recreation products.

lender.name: Melissa & Brad
lender.loan_because: We believe we are called to serve one another and want to plant seeds in others' lives. .
lender.occupational_info: Melissa previously coordinated the planning and processing of real estate development between the city jurisdictions and real estate developers in Los Angeles. She is now attending culinary school. Brad installs electrical wiring into buildings and houses, and repairs existing electrical infrastructure.

lender.name: Walter Cheeks
lender.loan_because: It brings happiness and joy to my life.
lender.occupational_info: I have a business that fixes broken computers and networks.

lender.name: Austin
lender.occupational_info: I teach English at a large high school in central Macedonia with the Peace Corps.

lender.name: Dick
lender.loan_because: Its a chance for me to "pay forward" and, in a very small way, to be an international business partner.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should be able to support themselves and families by doing what they love to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help small business owners with the parts of their businesses that they don't know how to do or don't like doing. I do it from home through the internet and phone.

lender.name: Keith & Barbara
lender.loan_because: Imagine the possibilities!

lender.name: Jeannine
lender.loan_because: I have lived in a developing country and have seen the difference a loan can make.
lender.occupational_info: I teach science to 13 and 14 year old students. Every day is an adventure!

lender.name: Libby
lender.loan_because: together, we can lift each other up.
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations find money so they can do good work for people.

lender.name: Dmytro
lender.loan_because: I want to take a credit because I have a wife with a little child, and from a barbershop I outlay all profit on them, and there is nothing for development
lender.occupational_info: I have a barbershop in town Brovary, it works already year and I want to buy in addition equipment there.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe that direct, person-to-person loans are far superior to banks, international agencies, and foreign aid. They are personal, focused, based on real needs, and include feedback.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired now, but my job was with a government agency that develops better ways to train and utilize soldiers.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: My mother always says sharing is caring.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student working towards my PhD in bioengineering.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about self-employment and the entrepreneurial spirit. Through my job I am lucky that every day I get to see the difference individuals can make.
lender.occupational_info: I work with entrepreneurs and small business owners in rural Nova Scotia. My job allows me to meet one on one with entrepreneurs to help them assess their goals and dreams. I provide guidance and counseling as well as financing assistance to help them make their business dreams a reality.

lender.name: Cori
lender.loan_because: Jesus first gave to me. I am blessed and I want to share my blessings.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: Test
lender.occupational_info: Test

lender.name: Stanislaw
lender.loan_because: I would like to help less fortunate
lender.occupational_info: Making work simpler

lender.name: Jonavon
lender.loan_because: I want to do something. This is simple.
lender.occupational_info: I translate words from humans to words for computers. I also make machines do what my bosses want them to do.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone does better when everyone does better.
lender.occupational_info: I teach reading and writing and social studies to 12 and 13 year olds
